name: RESTART NGINX
notes:
### Description

Reload NGINX gracefully.

### Requirements

- Root account
content:
if [[ $EUID -ne 0 ]]; then
   echo "this script must be run as root" 1>&2;
   exit 1
fi

if ! [ -x "$(command -v nginx)" ]; then
   service nginx reload
else
   echo "nginx not found" 1>&2;
   exit 1
fi
